Uses of Annotation Interface
net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy

Packages that use Strategy
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.model
Defines the concepts for estimation functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances
Package for distance metrics
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers
Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers
Contains the neural network optimizer algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars
Defines scalar functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations
Implements the different activation functions for neurons
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss
Provides the different loss functions used for training
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes
Provides the different regimes for training

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    EstimationFunction
    The EstimationFunction.estimate(float[]) method defines the contract for mapping input values to output values according to a specific estimation algorithm.

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    DistanceMetric
    This class represents a specific distance metrics to calculate the distances.
    class 
    EuclideanDistance
    Concrete implementation of the DistanceMetric strategy that calculates the Euclidean distance between two points in n-dimensional space.

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ConstantInitializer
    Implements an initializer that sets all parameters (weights and bias) to a given constant.
    class 
    HeInitializer
    He (Kaiming) weight initializer.
    interface 
    NeuralNetworkInitializer
    The initializer is used to set the initial parameter value of a neuron
    class 
    RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer
    Implements a random initializer.
    class 
    XavierInitializer
    Xavier (Glorot) weight initializer.

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.optimizers with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AdamOptimizer<N extends NeuralNetwork>
    Adam optimizer (Kingma & Ba, 2014).
    class 
    StochasticGradientDescent<N extends NeuralNetwork>
    Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) optimizer with per-sample backpropagation and batch accumulation of gradients.

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LinearCombination
    A simple linear scalar model of the form:
    class 
    NeuronFunction
    A neuron-like scalar function that combines a LinearCombination with a non-linear ActivationFunction.
    interface 
    ScalarEstimationFunction
    A specialization of EstimationFunction for functions that produce a single scalar output.
    interface 
    TrainableScalarFunction
    A scalar-valued function that is both TrainableFunction and ScalarEstimationFunction.

    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    ActivationFunction
    An ActivationFunction maps a logit to an output.
    class 
    Linear
    This activation function, also known as Identity or "no-activation" just returns the logit as output.
    class 
    ReLU
    Implements the Rectified Linear Unit (ReLU).
    class 
    Sigmoid
    Concrete ActivationFunction implementing the logistic sigmoid:
    class 
    Step
    Implements the step activation.

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    Initializer<E extends EstimationFunction>
    Defines an initialization strategy for an EstimationFunction.
    interface 
    ObjectiveFunction
    Represents an objective function that extends the concept of a LossFunction to provide both loss aggregation and gradient computation.
    class 
    ObjectiveFunctionImpl
    The implementation of the ObjectiveFunction.
    interface 
    Optimizer<E extends EstimationFunction>
    Defines an optimization algorithm for training an EstimationFunction.
    static interface 
    Optimizer.OnlineOnly<E extends EstimationFunction>
    An Optimizer variant that is restricted to online (sample-by-sample) optimization.
    interface 
    Regime
    Defines a training regime for machine learning models.
    interface 
    Trainer<E extends EstimationFunction>
    Defines a configurable trainer for EstimationFunctions.
    class 
    TrainerImpl<E extends EstimationFunction>
    Default implementation of the Trainer interface.

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    BatchLossFunction
    Represents a loss function that operates at the batch level, i.e., across multiple samples.
    class 
    BinaryCrossEntropy
    Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) loss function.
    interface 
    DimensionLossFunction
    Represents a loss function that operates at the per-dimension level.
    class 
    MeanError
    A loss function implementation that computes the mean error across samples or batches.
    interface 
    SampleLossFunction
    Represents a loss function that operates at the per-sample level.
    class 
    ScaledError
    A decorator loss function that applies a fixed scaling factor to the results of another loss function.
    class 
    SquaredError
    A DimensionLossFunction that computes the squared error between an estimated value and its target value.
    class 
    SummedError
    A loss function implementation that computes the sum of errors rather than their mean.

  • Uses of Strategy in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes with annotations of type Strategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    BatchRegime
    A Regime implementation that performs full-batch training.
    class 
    ChainedRegime
    Composes and executes a chain of Regime decorators.
    class 
    DumpNodesRegime
    A Regime decorator that dumps the internal node activations of a NeuralNetwork before and/or after each training epoch.
    final class 
    EpochRegime
    A Regime decorator that repeats training for a fixed number of epochs.
    final class 
    MiniBatchRegime
    A Regime decorator that performs training using mini-batches.
    class 
    ObjectiveReportingRegime
    A Regime decorator that wraps another training regime and reports the objective (loss) value at each epoch.
    final class 
    OnlineRegime
    A Regime decorator that performs online training (also known as stochastic training).
    class 
    StopIfNoImprovementRegime
    A Regime decorator that implements early stopping based on lack of improvement in the objective (loss).
